name: Yoda, Great Warrior
Lore: '''You must feel the Force around you. Here, between you, me, the tree, the rock, everywhere! Yes, even between the land and the ship.''',
Text: 'Deploys only to battlegrounds. Power +3 when defending a battle. You may not deploy [Episode I] Jedi. While with a Wookiee, adds one battle destiny. Once per game, may lose 2 Force from Force Pile to cancel a non-[Immune to Sense] Interrupt. Immune to attrition.(Original concept by Steven Lewis - Tennessee States 2006)(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
